oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Lay-down working cart improves efficacy of hand weeding
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Leinonen, P.
Närkki, V.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Weed management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Manual weed control is often the major limiting factor for organic vegetable production on a farm level. We have developed a Crawler, a wagon designed to support and transport a worker on the field.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Leinonen, P. and Närkki, V. (2004) Lay-down working cart improves efficacy of hand weeding. Paper at: 6th EWRS workshop on physical and cultural weed control, Lillehammer, Norway, 8-10 March 2004.
